title: nidalee bug
body: when playing vs a nidalee theres a weird visual bug happening in most games. basically, whenever someone on my team gains vision of her, her model appears wherever we last had vision of her then super speeds to where she actually is.   this has caused me to waste flashes and ults thinking shes next to me but shes actually not, or because the model needs to play catch up, sometimes she gets in range to attack you before you can see her.

replies.body: I can confirm I've seen this occur in ARAM, and multiple other people have seen it in the same game. It's extremely disorienting.
